dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A listener, Diana Alina, sent us this wild story from Semey about a kindergarten under siege by crows.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A listener, Diana Alina, sent us this wild story from Semey about a kindergarten under siege by crows.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Rescuers in Semey stepped in to protect children and parents after crows began aggressively attacking anyone approaching a kindergarten. A post shared by Diana Alina (@diana.alina.50552) The rescuers carefully picked up the fledgling and moved it to a safe distance away from the building, later releasing it back into the wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, yeah, I saw that. It was on Street No. 20, right? The emergency team had to get involved.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, yeah, I saw that. It was on Street No. twenty, right? The emergency team had to get involved.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The incident took place outside a kindergarten on Street No. 20. A response team from the regional department of emergency situations was dispatched to the scene.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. A baby crow fell right onto the front steps, and the parents just went into full protection mode. They were dive-bombing anyone who came near.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. A baby crow fell right onto the front steps, and the parents just went into full protection mode. They were dive-bombing anyone who came near.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Ministry of Emergency Situations (MES), a baby crow had fallen from its nest onto the kindergarten's front steps. Its parents became aggressive, attacking anyone who came near in an attempt to protect their young.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Which is, like, terrifying if you're just trying to drop your kid off at school.

dialogue_turns.text: Totally. So the Ministry of Emergency Situations actually dispatched a team to handle it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And no one got hurt? That's a relief.
